Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api

Class MediaManager

java.lang.Object
co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.MediaManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
SdkTags
public class MediaManager extends Object implements SdkTags
This class is responsible for manging the sdk image cache

  • Method Details

    • initCache

      public static void initCache(android.content.Context context, MceSdkConfiguration mceSdkConfiguration)

    • getImageCache

      public static MediaCache getImageCache()
      Retrieves the image cache instance
      Returns:
      The image cache instance

    • loadImage

      public static void loadImage(String url, android.graphics.Point requiredDimensions, MediaManager.OnImageLoadTask onImageLoadTask)
      Loads an image using the cache. If the image is not in the cache it will be downloaded and stored in the cache
      Parameters:
      url - The image url
      requiredDimensions - The required image dimensions.
      onImageLoadTask - A callback task that will be called once the image is downloaded

    • loadImageInCurrentThread

      public static void loadImageInCurrentThread(String url, android.graphics.Point requiredDimensions, MediaManager.OnImageLoadTask onImageLoadTask)
      Loads an image using the cache. If the image is not in the cache it will be downloaded in the current thread and stored in the cache
      Parameters:
      url - The image url
      requiredDimensions - The required image dimensions.
      onImageLoadTask - A callback task that will be called once the image is downloaded

    • loadImageInCurrentThread

      public static void loadImageInCurrentThread(String url)
      Loads an image using the cache. If the image is not in the cache it will be downloaded in the current thread and stored in the cache
      Parameters:
      url - The image url

    • setImage

      public static void setImage(String url, android.widget.ImageView imageView, android.app.Activity activity)
      Sets an image to an image view. The image is taken from the cache or downloaded if it's not in the cache
      Parameters:
      url - The image url
      imageView - The image view
      activity - The activity that holds the image view
